text: Jane Mackenzie (née Sym; March 22, 1825 – March 30, 1893) was the second wife of Alexander Mackenzie, the second Prime Minister of Canada. She married Alexander Mackenzie on June 17, 1853. The couple had no children, although Jane Mackenzie was stepmother to Alexander's daughter from his prior marriage. They are buried at the Lakeview Cemetery in Sarnia, Ontario. ==See also== *Spouse of the prime minister of Canada Category:1825 births Category:1893 deaths Category:Spouses of prime ministers of Canada
title: Jane Mackenzie
